Package org.zaproxy.zap.spider.filters

Class DefaultFetchFilter

java.lang.Object
org.zaproxy.zap.spider.filters.FetchFilter
org.zaproxy.zap.spider.filters.DefaultFetchFilter
@Deprecated public class DefaultFetchFilter extends FetchFilter
Deprecated.
(2.12.0) See the spider add-on in zap-extensions instead.
The DefaultFetchFilter is an implementation of a FetchFilter that is default for spidering process. Its filter rules are the following:
  • the resource protocol/scheme must be 'HTTP' or 'HTTPs'.
  • the resource must be found in the scope (domain) of the spidering process.
  • the resource must be not be excluded by user request - exclude list.
